column3:
Hey! That isn't fair! Knights can't fly! Only wizards like me can! And maybe also witches. Bobby yelled.
ewline
ewline"Yes! They can, too!" Frank said, "They're the most powerful and you can't stop me from flying!"
ewline
ewline"Well, if you fly, then I can fight with a sword, too. It's only fair," Bobby said back.
ewline
ewline"No! They can't! They aren't even strong enough to pick up a sword. They can't even pick up a knife, they're so weak! I don't even know what you're talking about. You're crazy, aren't you?" Frank pointed his finger at Bobby and ran at him with the sword made out of cardboard.
ewline
ewlineBobby jumped out of the way as quickly as he could! Bobby then pointed a finger at Frank. "FREEZE!"
ewline
ewlineFrank stopped in place. "Hey, you can't use the freeze spell. How can I fight you if I can't move? I'm going to tell mom."
ewline
ewline"I can use any spell I want! I can use Freeze, Trap, and Fly! I can do any of them!  I'm also telling mom that you think you can fly and you can't. You're a stupid knight with no brains. I have all the brains here." Bobby crossed his arms over his chest and stomped a foot on the ground.
ewline
ewline"You take that back! I'm the smartest knight there is and I'll get you any day!" Suddenly, Frank pulled Bobby to the ground. "Take it back right now!"
ewline
ewline"BOYS! What's all the noise?" Mom asked.
ewline
ewline"Bobby called me stupid!" Frank yelled.
ewline
ewline"Frank is trying to fly!" Bobby cried.
ewline
ewline"Oh boy." Mom laughed.
column4: one: What did Frank, the knight, use as a weapon?
column9: multiple: What did Frank try to do that Bobby didn't like
column19: multiple: What spell did Bobby use that Frank didn't like
